Name: valid_team_size
Description: A team must consist of 3 to 9 members according to Scrum guidelines

Name: valid_sprint_dates
Description: The start date of a sprint must be before its end date

Name: po_manages_one_backlog
Description: Each Product Owner is responsible for exactly one Product Backlog

Name: sprint_has_one_backlog
Description: Each Sprint Backlog must be associated with exactly one Sprint

Name: team_assigned_to_project
Description: Every active team must be assigned to at least one project

Name: task_status_domain
Description: The status of a task must be one of {todo

Name: worker_availability_constraint
Description: A worker cannot be allocated for more than their available capacity

Name: sprint_duration_limit
Description: A sprint's duration should not exceed 4 weeks (28 days)

Name: daily_scrum_duration
Description: The Daily Scrum meeting is time-boxed to 15 minutes

Name: user_story_has_points
Description: Every user story selected for a sprint must have story points assigned

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost must not exceed the project's allocated budget

Name: sprint_has_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a defined Sprint Goal

Name: worker_has_one_team
Description: Each worker can only belong to one team at a time
